title: Great experience!
text: I passed my driving test on the first attempt thanks to the excellent instruction at Fahrschule Schmidt. The instructors were patient and thorough.

title: Good school but expensive
text: The instruction was good, but I found the prices to be a bit high compared to other schools in the area.

title: Excellent theory classes
text: The theory classes were very informative and well-structured. The instructor made complex topics easy to understand.
